name: Classic Margarita
description: Rooted in the 1930s-1940s era of Mexico, the Classic Margarita has become a beloved icon in the cocktail world. Combining the vegetal notes of tequila with the sweet, citrusy burst of Cointreau and lime juice, it delivers a perfect balance of flavors. Traditionally served in a salt-rimmed glass to complement the sour profile, this cocktail is the epitome of Mexican mixology magic.
instructions: Rim edge of margarita glass in lime juice and coarse salt
Combine ingredients with ice and shake well.
